title: Cant alt tab and cant change resolution without crashing
body: For the last few months even after full reinstall and updating all my drivers when ever i alt tab i get bug splat. No matter what i do full screen border less and windowed the screen stays the same please help.

replies.body:
It sounds like the file saved server-side that interacts with all these changes on the back-end could be corrupt. I'd like us to run through a quick reset of the file together. First, **log into the Client** then jump into your config folder, which should be in this directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete the following files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these files, hop into a custom match to confirm the reset worked. You're now free to try changing your settings in-game, hopefully they stick now!

Thanks Targons Blade, this solution worked for me. Really happy someone had this problem like I did, helped me get past another great feature that LoL offers its users! 

Thanks again :)
